roleset.name: offer again
roleset.note: REOFFER-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to offer.01. (from reoffer.01-v)

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: [The debt]-1 was reoffered *-1 priced to yield from 6 % in 1991 to 7.15 % in 2008 - 2009 .
example.arg: to yield from 6 % in 1991 to 7.15 % in 2008 - 2009 .
